title: No, It's Us Too!
description: Well hello to you dear browser. Miranda Hart is on a mission to share her embarrassing stories and provide a Miran-ual for life in Is It Just Me? But in order to allay her fears that we all come-a-cropper in life, she asked the public to get in touch and share their pain because a problem shared is a... well it makes people laugh and that can't be bad can it?No, It's Us Too! is a compilation of the funniest, craziest and most cringe-worthy stories that came from you, to make us all feel a bit less lonely and self-conscious because let's face it - life is too short. This free eBook also includes an exclusive preview of Miranda Hart's hilarious Is It Just Me?Message from 'Well hello and thank you so much for sending in your fabulous and crazy stories and embarrassing anecdotes - I love you for that.I am very glad it's not just me.And you'll be pleased to hear that some of those stories have been chosen and made into an eBook. I know, clever isn't it?And that is available to download on a computery-machine type thing.For free. Yes for FREE and gratis. Don't say we don't treat you well.So go and have a look at that and hopefully see you soon.Bye for now.X'
author: Miranda Hart
